OnEncounterRoundEnd OnEncounterRoundStart OnEncounterTurnEnd OnEncounterTurnStart OnHP0 Checked when a unit's currentHP reaches 0. OnIncapacitation Checked after a unit recceives Incapacitation status. OnRemove Checked before a HookFunction is removed from a unit.
